<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Mammoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=202)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Found mostly in colder climates, mammoths are accustomed to dealing with desperate and dangerous predators, trampling and crushing their enemies while using their larger tusks to greater effect. Humanoids dwelling in harsh, frost-bound lands rely on the mammoth’s strength to help them survive.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Mammoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=202)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 154</row>

**Perception** +18; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +1

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 29 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +18 

+2 status to all saves vs. cold
</row>

**HP** 190

**Cold Adaptation** The mammoth reduces the effects it suffers from cold environments by one step.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 45 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tusk +22 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+12 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trunk +22 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** grabbing trunk

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +22 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+12 bludgeoning

**Dual Tusks** <actions string="Single Action" />  The mammoth makes two tusk Strikes, each against a different creature. This counts as one attack for the mammoth’s multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn’t increase until after both attacks.

**Grabbing Trunk**   A Medium or smaller creature hit by the mammoth's trunk is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). If the mammoth moves, it can bring the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) creature along with it.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Large or smaller, foot, DC 28

</column>
